entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow or rain. High 7. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow changing to 70 percent chance of rain showers near noon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to flurries after midnight. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023
